title: FPS DROP
body: I am getting this weird fps drop while playing league of legends. When i am in a team fight or someone would ult my fps would drop and my screen would freeze for no longer than a 2 seconds. I do not think i have an issue with my hardware because i just got a brand new PC with GTX 1080 graphic card and all of the hardware are updated.

replies.body: FPS issues can occur when game files are not rendered properly and cause it to stutter.  There could be a few reasons for this including hardware, drivers, or even the game files itself.  To help rule out possibilities and get to the bottom of this, check out our[ FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide.  The steps provided there should get you squared away, but let me know if you have any issues!
